page.title: 12EUROLINK INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The Eurolink Industrial Centre is on a piece of land to the West of Church Road,Murston,next to the London/Dover railway line.The land which stretches down to Milton Creek was formerly part of the Murston brickfields.There are 120 acres altogether of which 56 acres are already in use.The site has a good road and rail links and is close to the ferry and cargo port at Sheerness. Most of the units are large factories such as Qualitair(air conditioning), Harris Queensway (carpets),Everest (double glazing).There are smaller workshop units, together with banking and business support services at the Smeed Dean Centre in the centre of the estate.Some of the land is now being sold off to further developments.
